pages.text: Then when you are balanced on the ship, you and those with you, then say: "Praise is due only for Allah Who delivered us from the unjust people
And say, "My Fosterer! make me alight a blessed alighting and You are the Best of those who cause to alight
There are certainly signs in that, and We are ever testing (people)
Then after them We produced another generation
then We sent among them a messenger from among themselves (saying), "Serve Allah, there is no god for you other than Him. Will you not then guard (against the evil of worshipping others)

And the leaders of his people who did not believe and denied the meeting of the hereafter and whom We had made to enjoy in the life of the world said, â€œThis is no more than a man like yourselves, he eats from that from which you eat and he drinks from that which you drink
And if you obey a man like yourselves, then you will certainly be of the losers
Does he promise you, that when you are dead and you become (part of the) soil and bones, that you will be brought out (alive again)
Far, far is that which you are promised
There is nothing except our life of this world, we die and we live and we will not be of those who are raised (after death)
He is nothing but a man who has forged a lie against Allah and we are not of those who believe in him
He said, "My Fosterer! help me because they deny me
He said, "In a little while they will definitely become regretters
So a loud cry took hold of them in reality, then We made them rubbish, so away with the unjust people
Then after them We produced other generations
